channel.title: Me the noob got a question bout MOD
channel.description:
hi, ik new on this forum and stuff so i got a fiew questions
1. How do i make a character staff/mod? :eek: 2. are there any scrips for more NPCs all over the world off my serfer? :confused: 3. is there a way2 make qalphite queen avaleble2 kill? doest metter if its in face1 or 2 and that it doesnt transfer. 4. is there a script that makes more acient spells avalable?
thanks for your time, DD3 [br][size=1]Posted at: July 17, 2006, 06:24:57 PM[/size][hr]is i did anything wong by asking this please tell me and accept my apoligise :o

item.title: Me the noob got a question bout MOD
item.dc:creator: @bunny024 bunny024
item.description:
@bunny024 wrote:

  1. Go into characters, click on your character, change his player rights. 0 = regular player |1 = moderator |2 = admin 3 = owner. I hope this helped.

Read full topic
